text1.content: Annual forest loss includes permanent conversion of forest to other land uses (deforestation) and temporary forestloss (degradation). This is measured in hectares.

texts.content: Drivers of forest loss in the Brazilian Amazon
Annual forest loss includes permanent conversion of forest to other land uses (deforestation) and temporary forestloss (degradation). This is measured in hectares.
Data source: Tyukavina et al. (2017). Types and rates of forest disturbance in Brazilian Legal Amazon, 2000–2013. Science.
